description.raw:
I don't know what changed, but the homebrew one-line install script for gazebo doesn't have `/usr/local/bin` in the `PATH` anymore, so the script was unable to find the `brew` command.

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/gazebo-install-one_liner-homebrew-amd64/328

I've added it in this pull request.

Note that testing this requires changing the test script (like in 4bae3b5, which was [tested here](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_homebrew/job/gazebo-install-one_liner-homebrew-amd64/330/)).

I'm not sure if we need additional messaging to the user about adjusting their environment. I'll merge this PR now to fix jenkins, but please comment if we should adjust the messaging.
